content.question: Which of the following best explains the trend in the data between 2005 and 2016 ?

choices.label: Mexicans’ support for democracy gradually rose as the government began to bring the drug cartels under control.
Mexicans’ support for democracy gradually declined as Mexico’s problems continued under governments run by different parties.
Mexicans’ support for democracy gradually declined as the PRI’s dominance over the presidency continued.
Mexicans’ support for democracy gradually rose as new parties and coalitions entered the political scene to give the people more choices at the polls.

content.answer: Mexicans’ support for democracy gradually declined as Mexico’s problems continued under governments run by different parties.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
